sources.title: The Jackpot (1950)
sources.description: Bill Lawrence wins a bevy of prizes from a radio program, but ends up having to sell them in order to pay the taxes incurred. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-jackpot-1950/

metadata.Plot: Bill Lawrence wins a jackpot of prizes worth $24,000 on a radio quiz program. His happiness, and that of his family, is short-lived after he discovers he'll be compelled to sell the prizes in order to pay an amount of $7,000 income tax on them.
metadata.Writer: John McNulty, Phoebe Ephron, Henry Ephron
metadata.Actors: James Stewart, Barbara Hale, James Gleason
